pub_created_display: Ardashir I (224 to 240), AE/2, Group/ Mint A ("Stakhr")
issue_place_s: Group/ Mint A ("Stakhr"), Fars, Sasanian Empire
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown cap edged with a double row of pearls, crescent and dot in the center of lateral field; diadem, ends of diadem ribbons to the left and right; row of pearls from the shoulder to the breast; dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: 11 h l. i. bgy 'rth코tr[y?]- 2 h l. o. (retrograde) MLKA| bay Arda코ir 코캐h| "The divine Ardashir, King"
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; round altar shaft; four altar slabs; altar flames depicted with vertical strokes; to the left and right mushroom-shaped bases supporting lion-paw structures; dotted border
